title: Manage access via application tokens
tokenParagraphe1: Your data and business security is paramount. This is why you are required to provide additional authentication when using AI Tools.
tokenParagraphe2: Tokens are used as unique authenticators. They allow you to access your notebooks, jobs and apps in a granular way, for example by selecting by label.
tokenParagraphe3: Tokens are specific to each AI Tool.
formAddTokenFieldLabelDescription: Tokens can be assigned to a specific resource (AI Notebook, Job and App) using label selectorsâ€”or if you leave the field empty, they can be assigned to all your resources. You can also specify token privileges to include administrative or read-only rights.
formAddTokenDefaultLabelsDescription: By default, your applications will have the following labels:
formAddTokenFieldRoleInfo: Choose an Administrator or Operator role (easy to use)
formAddTokenFieldRegionInfo: Region for which the token will be active
formTokenErrorMaxLength: Please enter a maximum of {{max}} characters
formTokenNameErrorPattern: Must only contain numbers, letters, underscores and dashes, and must not start with a dash.
formTokenLabelErrorPattern: The label selector must be in the following form: label=value
formTokenToastErrorTitle: An error has occurred generating your token
deleteTokenDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the {{ name }} token?
deleteTokenToastErrorTitle: An error has occurred deleting your token
renewTokenToastErrorTitle: An error has occurred regenerating your token
renewTokenDescription: Are you sure you want to regenerate the {{ name }} token?
renewTokenSuccess: Here is the new value of your token, save it:
